name: Ventas x Dia x Unidad
query:
select
d.posting_date as "Fecha",
d.customer as "Cliente:Link/Customer:120",
b.parent as "Docto:Link/Sales Invoice:120",
IFNULL(b.item_code, 'TOTAL') as "Clave:Link/Item:120",
b.description as "Descripcion::200",
SUM(b.qty) as "Cantidad:Float:140", 
SUM(case when b.parent LIKE '%%TICKET%%' then b.amount / 1.16 else b.amount end) as "Importe Ventas", 
SUM(@ImporteCosto := (b.last_purchase_rate)*(b.qty)) as "Importe Costo:Float:140",
SUM(@Utilidad := (b.amount)-(@ImporteCosto)) AS "Utilidad:Float:140",
AVG(@Porcentaje := TRUNCATE ((@Utilidad * 100 /(b.amount)/ 1), 0)) AS "Porcentaje:Float:140",
d.currency as "Moneda",
d.agente as "Vendedor",
e.operador as "Operador",
e.telemarketing as "Telemarketing"

from
`tabSales Invoice Item` b left join
`tabItem` c on b.item_code = c.item_code left join
`tabSales Invoice` d on b.parent = d.name left join
`tabvariables` e on d.name = e.parent
where d.posting_date >= %(d.from_date)s and d.posting_date <= %(d.to_date)s and d.docstatus = '1' and d.currency = 'MXN' and d.customer != 'CHARROS'
GROUP BY b.parent desc, b.item_code WITH ROLLUP
